abstract: Dennis Rommedahl (born 22 July 1978) is a Danish footballer, who currently plays as a right winger for RKC Waalwijk. He has played 125 matches and scored 21 goals for the Danish national side. Rommedahl was selected for the Danish squads at the 2002 World Cup, Euro 2004, the 2010 World Cup and Euro 2012. He was nominated for Danish Footballer of the Year in 2007, though he later won the award in 2010.
